analysis.description:
CARToken.allocateTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x423e4322cdda29156b49a17dfbd2acc4b280600d.sol#138-187) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > month12Unlock && ! month12Allocated (/unique_chucks/4/0x423e4322cdda29156b49a17dfbd2acc4b280600d.sol#141-158)
	- block.timestamp > month24Unlock && ! month24Allocated (/unique_chucks/4/0x423e4322cdda29156b49a17dfbd2acc4b280600d.sol#150-158)
	- block.timestamp > month60Unlock && ! month60Allocated (/unique_chucks/4/0x423e4322cdda29156b49a17dfbd2acc4b280600d.sol#173-185)
	- block.timestamp > month30Unlock && ! month30Allocated (/unique_chucks/4/0x423e4322cdda29156b49a17dfbd2acc4b280600d.sol#158-185)
	- block.timestamp > month48Unlock && ! month48Allocated (/unique_chucks/4/0x423e4322cdda29156b49a17dfbd2acc4b280600d.sol#166-185)

CARToken.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x423e4322cdda29156b49a17dfbd2acc4b280600d.sol#187-200) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- totalTokenSaled + amountToken <= totalTokensCrowdSale && block.timestamp <= endTokenSale (/unique_chucks/4/0x423e4322cdda29156b49a17dfbd2acc4b280600d.sol#190-200)
